Name: Hanapon Princess
About the game: One afternoon, after a trip to an antique store, it turns out that a simple statue is actually a magical being from the land of Hanapon. But whoâ€™s the better candidate to rule? Meet and talk with all the sisters and decide for yourself! Hanapon Princess is a dating sim / visual novel! Key Features 4 Different girls to seduce in this Japanese fantasy world. 4 Endings based on player choices and different branching paths! Comedy scenes like in harem anime series! 20+ Scenes that can be unlocked to see on CG Gallery.
